title: Poster, "I [Heart] NY More Than Ever", 2001
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Bottom center in multi-colored pencil: Milton Glaser
description:
At top, the letter "I" is paired with a red heart symbol bearing a black spot at lower left. The letters, N and Y are directly below and the remaining words fill the sheet, becoming smaller on the last line.  
Below the logo is the following text: BE GENEROUS. YOUR CITY NEEDS YOU. THIS POSTER IS NOT FOR SALE.
Printed at edge of sheet on right side: This poster was designed by Milton Glaser @ 2001, printed by Rasco Graphics Inc., and distributed by the School of Visual Arts all of whom love New York.
